New Records: Mali scored the second-fastest goal in the tournament, achieving it in 133 seconds
Key Match Events: Edmond Tapsoba scored an own goal for Mali
Lassine Sinayoko scored two goals for Mali
Bertrand Traore reduced the lead for Burkina Faso with a penalty
Issoufou Dayo had a goal ruled offside for Burkina Faso
Pre-Game Insights: Mali made six changes from their previous side, including a new four-man midfield
Burkina Faso changed four of their side from their previous match
Post-Match Reflections: Lassine Sinayoko expressed his happiness with the victory while acknowledging there is still work to be done
Mali will face hosts Ivory Coast in the quarter-finals
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played in 36 degrees Celsius heat
Premier League duo Yves Bissouma and Dango Ouattara started on the bench for Mali and Burkina Faso respectively
